document.heading: Advisory Neighborhood Commissions Boundaries Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-157, the “Advisory Neighborhood Commissions Boundaries Act of 2012”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-528, which was retained by the Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 20, 2012, and May 1, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 15, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-364 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-157 became effective on July 13, 2012.
